    • Field Detail

      • nodeCount

        private final int nodeCount
        Actual number of nodes. nodeId is in [1, nodeCount]

      • zoneCount

        private final int zoneCount
        Number of zones. A zone is a subset of nodes. Some zones are terminal zones, that is they cannot be used for routing traffic going to other zones. Other zones can.

      • linkCount

        private final int linkCount
        Actual number of links. linkId is in [1, linkCount]

      • links

        private final Network.Links links
        The set of links. [1, linkCount]

      • outLinks
